keybind.chatonlostfocus.onOffBind: Toggle chat on lost focus functionality
overlay.chatonlostfocus.on: §aChat on lost focus has been enabled
overlay.chatonlostfocus.off: §cChat on lost focus has been disabled
text.autoconfig.chatonlostfocus.title: Chat on Lost Focus settings
text.autoconfig.chatonlostfocus.option.t: What will be written in the chat when you switch the window.
